name: addition/proposal
description: New features or enhancements

name: anchor permanence
description: Identifies issues opened by other standards organizations, under our [anchor permanence policy](https://whatwg.org/working-mode#anchors), indicating to an editor that a certain anchor is being referenced and should work forever

name: clarification
description: Standard could be clearer

name: compat
description: Standard is not web compatible

name: do not merge yet
description: Pull request must not be merged per rationale in comment

name: i18n-comment
description: Used by the internationalization community to track issues they have raised

name: i18n-tracking
description: Used by the internationalization community to track issues they are interested in or the WHATWG community thinks the internationalization community might be interested in

name: i18n-alreq
description: Used by the internationalization community to notify Arabic script experts of relevant issues

name: i18n-clreq
description: Used by the internationalization community to notify Chinese script experts of relevant issues

name: i18n-hlreq
description: Used by the internationalization community to notify Hebrew script experts of relevant issues

name: i18n-ilreq
description: Used by the internationalization community to notify Indic script experts of relevant issues

name: i18n-jlreq
description: Used by the internationalization community to notify Japanese script experts of relevant issues

name: i18n-klreq
description: Used by the internationalization community to notify Korean script experts of relevant issues

name: impacts documentation
description: Used by documentation communities, such as MDN, to track changes to standards that the WHATWG community believes have an impact on documentation

name: interop
description: Implementations are not compatible

name: needs concrete proposal
description: Moving the issue forward requires someone to figure out a detailed plan

name: needs implementer interest
description: Moving the issue forward requires implementers to express interest

name: needs tests
description: Moving the issue forward requires someone to write tests

name: removal/deprecation
description: Removing or deprecating a feature

name: security/privacy
description: There are security or privacy implications

name: topic: custom elements
description: Relates to custom elements (as defined in DOM and HTML)

name: topic: shadow
description: Relates to shadow trees (as defined in DOM)
